message:
Great! I've successfully created a "HeroBanner" component with the features you requested:

1. **Red Background**: The component uses a red background color (bg-red-600) with white text for good contrast.

2. **Text Elements**: 
   - A large, bold title that's responsive across different screen sizes
   - A descriptive paragraph that explains the purpose of the section

3. **Call-to-Action Button**: 
   - A white button with red text that links to the specified URL
   - Hover effect that changes the background color slightly for better user interaction

4. **Customizable Props**:
   - Banner Title: Controls the main heading text
   - Banner Description: Controls the paragraph text
   - Button Text: Sets the text displayed on the button
   - Button Link: Specifies where the button should link to (accepts relative URLs)

The component is fully responsive and uses Tailwind CSS for styling. It will adapt to different screen sizes with appropriate spacing and font sizes. The component is now ready to be used in your Experience Builder pages!
